about_the_game:
As featured in PC-Gamer and Indie-Gems, among others...

---

Hive Defender is a frantic, fast-paced, and very difficult real-time tactics game.

  • Play as 4 different alien swarms simultaneously.
  • Fully destructible and procedurally generated maze-like hives.
  • Unlock and activate special perks.
  • Team up with friends online or play alone for added challenge.
  • Defend your alien's nests from waves of human invaders.



Here's what you can expect before the final release.

  • Boss waves with special abilities which require all 4 swarms working together!
  • Challenge mode, for the most hard core players and for people looking to train their skills!
  • Endless mode, for people looking for a long form experience, and those wanting a top spot on the leaderboards!
  • Improved A/V feedback, especially for key moments in the game!
  • Improved personalization of input and output, and A/V customization!
  • Bug fixes, difficulty and progression update passes, and quality of life improvements!

Wishlist Hive Defender today!

short_description: Classic RTS and Tower Defense elements combine inside of a procedurally generated and fully destructible labyrinth. Control multiple alien swarms simultaneously, unlock and activate special abilities, and team up with friends online to beat back waves of human invaders!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
